get.summary: Get Subscription Info by Short UUID

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Subscription type (required if encodedTag is provided). Only SS is supported for now.

parameters.name: encodedTag
parameters.description: Base64 encoded tag for Outline config. This paramter is optional. It is required only when type=ss.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Number of subscriptions to return, no more than 500

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Start index (offset) of the users to return, default is 0

info.title: Remnawave API v1.6.15
info.description:
Remnawave is a powerful proxy managment tool, built on top of Xray-core, with a focus on simplicity and ease of use.

## Resources
* https://t.me/remnawave
* https://github.com/remnawave
* https://remna.st

username.description: Unique username for the user. Required. Must be 6-36 characters long and contain only letters, numbers, underscores and dashes.

status.description: Optional. User account status. Defaults to ACTIVE.

subscriptionUuid.description: Optional. UUID for user subscription. Must be a valid UUID format.

shortUuid.description: Optional. Short UUID identifier for the user.

trojanPassword.description: Optional. Password for Trojan protocol. Must be 8-32 characters.

vlessUuid.description: Optional. UUID for VLESS protocol. Must be a valid UUID format.

ssPassword.description: Optional. Password for Shadowsocks protocol. Must be 8-32 characters.

trafficLimitBytes.description: Optional. Traffic limit in bytes. Set to 0 for unlimited traffic.

activeUserInbounds.description: Optional. Array of UUIDs representing enabled inbound connections.

lastTrafficResetAt.description: Optional. Date of last traffic reset. Format: 2025-01-17T15:38:45.065Z

description.description: Optional. Additional notes or description for the user account.

tag.description: Optional. User tag for categorization. Max 16 characters, uppercase letters, numbers and underscores only.

telegramId.description: Optional. Telegram user ID for notifications. Must be an integer.

email.description: Optional. User email address. Must be a valid email format.

hwidDeviceLimit.description: Optional. Maximum number of hardware devices allowed. Must be a positive integer.

activateAllInbounds.description: Optional. Whether to enable all available inbound connections. Boolean.

shortUuid.description: Optional. If not provided, a new short UUID will be generated by Remnawave. Please note that it is strongly recommended to allow Remnawave to generate the short UUID.
